data.text: Wɛlɛ, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii ɠa ʋaazu
kɔɔɠɔ nu ɠɛzɛiti ta salaʋusuiti,
nu ʋuulɔɔlugɔ (50) ɠundiɠiiti ta seizumaanɛgiti,
«Nà buzeɠe niinɛgiti sei ti unda ga kundiɠiiti,
Ta ɓɔɠɔ zopele ɲɔu ti ɠilagilagi,
Zunui ta ɠa ɗa yeeʋili kɛɛɠɛloin zu, ná-bolodamai ta, é ɠɛ ma:
Naama volo ná, zɔi ɠa gooɠaaʋote ga woo wola, é ɠɛ ma:
Zeluzalɛme ɓunɛni,
Ti ɠaazulo pelei zeele wooi woni ti laalɔɠɔma.
Wa zoo wo bo telebo nui ma
Maanɔɠɔ ɠa faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti bɛ!
Nà-nuɓusɛiti ta kpɔlɔi zu buzeɠe niinɛgiti zea,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wuzeɠea tukpɔlo fai ma,
É lia ga ná-nuɓusɛiti ta-ɠundiɠiiti ta totuɠɔiti tukpɔɠaaleʋezuʋɛ, é ɠɛ ma:
Leeni ɠa losu ma mu, wo nà-nuɓusɛiti fɔkisu,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠɛni ma:
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa kpaanagi ɠɛɛzu Siyɔn anzanuiti unmaʋɛ,
Naama volo ná, Maliɠii ɠa ta-maaɠili zɔɔlaiti kula ti ma, niiti ti ga: balaɠaegiti ti ti-ɠɔɠɔiti ba, timɔ wɔɔlɔgiti, ta balai kulaai ga alu toga niinɛi,
goizu anigiti, ta balaiti, ta bɔɔlɔgiti,
masa bɔɔlɔgiti, kɔɠɔ ʋa yɔlɔɠɔiti, saamaɠili fɛlɛaiti, gulɔ maku nɛɛnɛ puu aniiti, undaanɛ zɔlɔɔ ganii,
balaɠaegiti, ta sokpazu ʋalaɠaegiti,
seɠe ʋapa golaiti, ta seɠewuzeɠe wolaiti, ta seɠeungiti, ta ɓɔlɔiti,
pɛtɛgiti, ta geze zeɠei, ta seɠe zakpai tɔungi ma, ta nii ti kpesasu ɠakai wu.
Ani luulai makugi ɠa a ɠɛ ʋɛ ta-wulɔ maku nɛɛnɛgi ná,
Ɗa-zalaʋusuiti ta loo bu ga boɠa zɔkpɔi,
Naama volo ná, Siyɔn ná-pɛlɛla ɓogiti pɛ ta kpalagi wo, ti ɠaalɛi.
